text: I was wondering if there is any plans to integrate Grammarly into HubSpot?

Hi Developers. Is it possible to populate HubDB with Deals in the portals Pipeline? I am looking to embed the HubDB data on a public facing website and think this might be the best solution, rather than syncing deal data to a Google Sheet and embedding that.
Hey Isaiah! Hope all is well! Iâ€™ll take this to our team and let you know what I find out!
In the mean-time I have seen users use the Grammarly chrome extension with HubSpot in the past. Others in this community may have input on the experience of using it with HubSpot.
You would have to write up something custom to accomplish this
lol.  My obvious response to this was to search for an Emmet extension.
<@U26EWKYLC> If you just need to use deal data to web pages , will the `crm_objects` hubl function help you? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions>
<@U2H3TT8F2> awesome! Thanks man! all is well hope the same for you too!

<@U7SL518D6> and <@U54TVT3C1> I was talking about for when you are doing content updates specifically within the email design editor text modules.
